sections.text:
71-8230.Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center, defined.

Specialty level burn or pediatric trauma center means a trauma center that provides specialized care in the areas of burns or pediatrics.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, ยง 30;Laws 2009, LB195, ยง 95;Laws 2015, LB46, ยง 8;Laws 2023, LB227, ยง 103.
